attributes.action: non resident fathers get ripped off by old system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: AS FATHERS EVEN IF WE AGREE AN AMMOUNT WITH OUR EX WIVES, AND HAVE BEEN PAYING THEM A BIT MORE THAN THE NEW SYSTEM. IN COMES THE CSA AND STOPS £715.15 A MONTH MORE THAN 40% AND WE HAVE NO RIGHTS TO STOP THEM,THEY BREAK THERE OWN RULES AND NOBODY CAN DO ANYTHING NOT EVEN THE PM

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
